steps.title: Wash your face with warm water.
steps.content: Wash your face with warm water. Ideally, you should wash your face thoroughly with warm running water before using the Clearasil pads. [2] X Research source Make sure to wash your face gently so you don't injure or irritate your skin. After washing pat your face dry (don't rub) with a clean, dry towel.

steps.title: Take a Clearasil pad and gently wipe it over your face and neck.
steps.content: Take a Clearasil pad and gently wipe it over your face and neck. Make sure you wipe the entire affected area to ensure the pad's medication is evenly distributed. Allow to dry. Do not rinse off. [3] X Research source Do this about 1 to 3 times per day or as needed.

steps.title: Dispose of any used pads in a garbage bin.
steps.content: Dispose of any used pads in a garbage bin. Clearasil pads are intended for single use only, so make sure to throw used pads away. Avoid flushing the pad down the toilet as this may lead to clogging. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Store Clearasil pads properly.
steps.content: Store Clearasil pads properly. It is important to store the Clearasil pads properly to prevent them from becoming dried out. [5] X Research source If you are using the Rapid Action Pads, Deep Pore Cleansing Pads, and Pore Cleansing Pads, replace the lid tightly. If you are using the Deep Cleansing Wipes, reseal the pack after use.

steps.title: Wash your hands after using the pads.
steps.content: Wash your hands after using the pads. This is to remove any acne medication from your hands. Use a mild soap and warm running water. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Test the product to check for allergic reactions.
steps.content: Test the product to check for allergic reactions. If it is your first time to use Clearasil pads, it is important to use your first application as an initial trial. [7] X Research source Every person's skin may react to the pads differently, so after the initial application observe the effect of the product on your skin. If you donâ€™t notice any dryness or irritation, then you can increase to using the pads 2 or 3 times per day.

steps.title: Only use Clearasil pads externally.
steps.content: Only use Clearasil pads externally. Clearasil pads are for external use only. Avoid allowing the pads to come in contact with the eyes. If the medications happens to get into your eye, rinse it thoroughly with running water. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Avoid mixing topical acne medications.
steps.content: Avoid mixing topical acne medications. It is advisable to use only one topical acne medication. If you are using Clearasil pads at the same time as other anti-acne medications, you may experience negative side effects. Your skin might become excessively dry and irritated. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Stop using Clearasil pads if your skin condition gets worse.
steps.content: Stop using Clearasil pads if your skin condition gets worse. If using Clearasil makes your acne worse or irritates your skin, you should stop using it immediately and consult your doctor. They may be able to recommend a more gentle alternative, especially if you have sensitive skin. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Store the Clearasil pads at room temperature.
steps.content: Store the Clearasil pads at room temperature. Clearasil Pads should be stored at room temperature, away from direct sunlight. A bathroom cabinet or a drawer beside your bed is perfect. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Use Clearasil Deep Cleansing Wipes to remove make-up and impurities.
steps.content: Use Clearasil Deep Cleansing Wipes to remove make-up and impurities. Clearasil Deep Cleansing Wipes are designed to lift away impurities and make-up from the skin. This product is very useful because it can be used almost anywhere, at anytime. With each use, you can remove traces of oil, dirt, and makeup that facial soap failed to get rid of.

steps.title: Use Clearasil Rapid Action Pads to reduce acne and redness within 4 hours.
steps.content: Use Clearasil Rapid Action Pads to reduce acne and redness within 4 hours. Rapid Action Pads are well-known for their fast action. They can visibly reduce acne problems or skin redness within just 4 hours. Like other products, these pads will deeply cleanse pores, reduce the appearance of greasiness and remove excessive oil from the skin. The pads are pre-moistened so you can easily use them without water.

steps.title: Use Clearasil Deep Pore Cleansing Pads to quickly reduce pimple size.
steps.content: Use Clearasil Deep Pore Cleansing Pads to quickly reduce pimple size. The Deep Pore Cleansing Pads are specially designed to reduce pimple size and redness within 4 hours. If you have a special event and you need to get rid of breakouts as quickly as possible, this product is ideal. These pads have been tested by dermatologists who found evidence that this produce can quickly open blocked pores and get rid of pimples.

steps.title: Use Clearasil Pore Cleansing Pads to achieve clearer, smoother skin.
steps.content: Use Clearasil Pore Cleansing Pads to achieve clearer, smoother skin. The Pore Cleansing Pads are geared towards clearer and smoother facial skin. They also have an exfoliating action that banishes dead skin cells and impurities. They can also open up blocked pores and prevent breakouts. These pads are designed with textured cotton to deliver more effective exfoliation.
